20030504



Head of Iran 's largest daily quits after conservatives win Tehran city hall



TEHRAN , May 4 ( AFP )
0,0 gpe|5,5 org


The pro-reform director of Iran 's biggest-selling daily newspaper and official organ of Tehran 's municipality has stepped down following the appointment of a conservative as the city 's new mayor , press reports said Sunday .
24,24 per|30,30 per|8,8 org|13,13 gpe|27,27 gpe|11,11 per|2,2 per|4,4 gpe
2,2 per|8,8 org| org-aff|30,30 per|27,27 gpe| org-aff|8,8 org|4,4 gpe| gen-aff

Mohammad Atrianfar , who had headed Hamshahri ( Fellow Citizen ) since it was founded a decade ago and was a major backer of reformist President Mohammed Khatami , explained that he wanted to " leave the new mayor with a free hand to choose a director " of the paper .
46,46 per|38,38 per|6,6 org|8,9 org|50,50 org|12,12 org|0,1 per|3,3 per|22,22 per|31,31 per|26,27 per|25,25 per
0,1 per|6,6 org| org-aff|46,46 per|50,50 org| org-aff

Tehran had been governed by reformists since 1989 , but a conservative city council was elected in the February 28 municipal polls in a result attributed to a meager turnout amid growing public disillusionment with electoral politics .
5,5 per|13,13 per|12,12 gpe|0,0 gpe
13,13 per|12,12 gpe| org-aff|5,5 per|0,0 gpe| org-aff

Mahmud Ahmadi-Nejad , reported to be a hardliner among conservatives , was appointed mayor on Saturday and a change in Hamshahri 's management -- as well as its editorial line -- has been considered inevitable given the election result .
9,9 per|0,1 per|13,13 per|7,7 per|27,27 org|20,20 org


Founded by former mayor Gholamhossein Karbaschi , Hamshahri was quick to become Iran 's biggest-selling daily with a circulation of 450,000 .

4,5 per|7,7 org| org-aff|15,15 org|12,12 gpe| gen-aff

It also built up healthy finances , carrying scores of pages of private advertisements daily .

WERKHEISER OUT-RAISES OPPONENT AND LEADS CHALLENGERS STATEWIDE
0,0 per|2,2 per|5,5 per


Greg Werkheiser , candidate for the House of Delegates from the 42nd District in southern Fairfax County , has raised significantly more money to date than his incumbent opponent , David Albo , and leads all challengers statewide in fundraising , according to reports filed with the State Board of Elections on January 18 , 2005 .
0,1 per|3,3 per|26,26 per|28,28 per|30,31 per|36,36 per|6,8 org|11,12 gpe|47,50 org|15,16 loc
3,3 per|6,8 org| org-aff|3,3 per|11,12 gpe| org-aff|11,12 gpe|15,16 loc| part-whole

Werkheiser out-raised his opponent by almost 2 to 1 : Werkheiser $ 81,615 ; Albo $ 55,119 .
0,0 per|2,2 per|10,10 per|3,3 per|14,14 per


Werkheiser now has twice as much unencumbered cash on hand as his opponent : Werkheiser $ 50,017 ; Albo $ 23,767
0,0 per|11,11 per|14,14 per|12,12 per|18,18 per


Werkheiser 's contributions come from 200 individuals ; Albo had 8 individual contributors .
0,0 per|8,8 per|6,6 per|12,12 per


Werkheiser leads all challengers statewide in total contributions raised and funds on-hand .
0,0 per|3,3 per


The 42nd House of Delegates District forms the southern tip of Fairfax County .
5,5 gpe|9,9 loc|11,12 gpe
9,9 loc|11,12 gpe| part-whole

Nearly fifty-two percent of the district voted for John Kerry in 2004 , and Governor Mark Warner won the district with similar margins in 2001 . "
19,19 gpe|5,5 gpe|2,2 per|8,9 per|15,16 per|14,14 per


I am humbled by the support of so many citizens in the 42nd District who are voting with their pocketbooks for a change in leadership .
0,0 per|12,13 gpe|9,9 per|14,14 per|18,18 per

While we are very pleased with this outpouring of support , I am going to keep doing what I have been doing : listening to my neighbors and working to make our communities in Fairfax County a better place to live , work and raise a family , " stated Werkheiser .

0,0 gpe|5,5 org

0,0 per|10,10 gpe

1,2 per


ATTENTION - UPDATES / / /



WASHINGTON , April 28 ( AFP ) - North Korea has offered to scrap its nuclear weapons and missile programs , but only in return for " considerable " diplomatic , political and economic concessions , the United States said Monday .
8,9 gpe|14,14 gpe|37,38 gpe|18,18 wea|0,0 gpe|16,16 wea|5,5 org

OIADVANTAGE_20041224 .1007



WEB TEXT



2004-12-24T10 :07:00



Who will lead the revolution ?



Would you believe MBAs ?



John A
0,1 per


2004-12-24T10 :07:00



For my holiday post , I offer a message of hope for the business world .
1,1 per|5,5 per


In 1994 , I was a graduate student in Boston .
3,3 per|7,7 per|9,9 gpe
7,7 per|9,9 gpe| phys

I was asked to moderate a panel discussion on social entrepreneurship for a conference at Harvard Business School .
0,0 per|15,17 org


The conference was being held by a new group called Students for Responsible Business .
10,13 org|8,8 org


I expected to see a small gathering of idealistic , slightly naive MBA students .
0,0 per|13,13 per|6,6 per


What I found was a packed room of 200 intelligent , practical , driven idealists .
1,1 per|14,14 per|6,6 fac
14,14 per|6,6 fac| phys

These students were determined to figure out how to use business as a driver for positive social change .
1,1 per


I left that room with my eyes open to the possibilities presented by these future business leaders .
0,0 per|5,5 per|16,16 per|15,15 org|3,3 fac
0,0 per|3,3 fac| phys

Fast forward 10 years .



Students for Responsible Business is now called Net Impact .
0,3 org|7,8 org


In 2004 , I had the opportunity to attend their conference hosted by The University of Texas McCombs Business School .
9,9 org|17,19 org|3,3 per|14,16 org
17,19 org|14,16 org| part-whole

Net Impact had grown to include over 9,000 MBA students and alumni .
0,1 org|9,9 per|11,11 per
9,9 per|0,1 org| org-aff|11,11 per|0,1 org| org-aff

Approximately 900 people attended the 2004 conference .
2,2 per


The buzz words flying around the conference included social entrepreneurship , sustainable profitability , working with passion .



I met student after student intent on harnessing the forces of business and capitalism to improve the world .
2,2 per|4,4 per|17,17 loc|0,0 per


These students understand that business is a powerful lever of change in this world .
1,1 per|13,13 loc


Recently business schools have received their share of criticism for turning out graduates who seem to have lost sight of their responsibility for ethical action .
2,2 org|5,5 org|12,12 per|13,13 per|20,20 per


I can tell you that I am seeing a powerful groundswell of change coming from within business schools .
17,17 org|3,3 per|0,0 per|5,5 per


It is not coming from the faculty , or the alumni , or the administration .
10,10 per|6,6 per|14,14 org


All these groups continue to pay lipservice to topics of social responsibility while avoiding any real innovations in the student experiences .
19,19 per|2,2 per


The change is being demanded by the students .
7,7 per


A little secret of business schools is that MBA students have an immense amount of sway .
5,5 org|9,9 per
9,9 per|5,5 org| org-aff

Few choose to use it , but if they want they can fundamentally change their school .
0,0 per|8,8 per|10,10 per|14,14 per|15,15 org
14,14 per|15,15 org| org-aff

Right now students at business schools are asking for more discussion of these topics in classes , are initiating service projects , forming support group for social entrepreneurs , inviting speakers to campus to discuss sustainability , social investing , non-profit innovations , etc. .
5,5 org|2,2 per|24,24 per|27,27 per|30,30 per|32,32 fac
2,2 per|5,5 org| org-aff|30,30 per|32,32 fac| phys

Net Impact is often at the center of these efforts .
0,1 org


These are not isolated events ... This is a revolution from within .



I have no doubt that in 10 years we will see the vast positive impact that these students are having in the world of business and society at large .
0,0 per|8,8 per|17,17 per


In 1776 Adam Smith spoke of enlightened self-interest in The Wealth of Nations .
2,3 per


I often feel that we have conveniently forgotten his emphasis on enlightened which he defined as being committed to being a good citizen and steward of society .
0,0 per|4,4 per|26,26 per|8,8 per|13,13 per|22,22 per|24,24 per


I am excited and hopeful that this new generation of business leaders will bring this emphasis front and center .
0,0 per|8,8 per|11,11 per


If you are an MBA student and want a good reference for comparing how MBA programs integrate issues of sustainability and social responsibility into the student experience a good place to start is the Beyond Grey Pinstripes report produced by The Aspen Institute .
25,25 per|1,1 per|5,5 per|41,42 org


Happy Holidays to everyone !!
3,3 per

U.S. , Britain drafting resolution limiting U.N. role in Iraq to humanitarian relief



LONDON ( AP )
0,0 gpe|2,2 org


The United States and Britain are preparing a resolution that would give the United Nations a role in humanitarian relief but not peacekeeping in Iraq , a senior official in U.S . President George W. Bush 's administration said Friday .
4,4 gpe|13,14 org|1,2 gpe|30,30 gpe|24,24 gpe|32,32 per|33,35 per|28,28 per|37,37 org
32,32 per|30,30 gpe| org-aff

Separately , the United States has decided to divide the military and humanitarian relief mission in Iraq into three parts under American , British and Polish command , the official said , speaking on condition of anonymity .
25,25 gpe|23,23 gpe|3,4 gpe|21,21 gpe|16,16 gpe|29,29 per|10,10 org


Six European countries have agreed to contribute troops to the British and Polish sectors to create an international stability force , the official said .
12,12 gpe|2,2 gpe|1,1 gpe|7,7 per|13,13 org|10,10 gpe|19,19 org|22,22 per
7,7 per|2,2 gpe| org-aff|13,13 org|19,19 org| org-aff|2,2 gpe|1,1 gpe| part-whole

The draft resolution would limit the U.N .
6,6 org


role to helping with refugees and displaced people , reconstruction and humanitarian assistance , the official said .
4,4 per|7,7 per|15,15 per


The United States and Britain agree on all but a few of the fine details of the resolution , the official said , though there is no timetable on when it would be introduced .
4,4 gpe|1,2 gpe|20,20 per


U.N . officials are already in Iraq providing humanitarian relief .
0,0 org|2,2 per|6,6 gpe
2,2 per|6,6 gpe| phys|2,2 per|0,0 org| org-aff

U.N . Secretary General Kofi Annan said this week that the body has no interest in policing a postwar Iraq , although it could contribute to the political resuscitation of the country .
0,0 org|11,11 org|22,22 org|2,2 per|4,5 per|19,19 gpe|31,31 gpe

`` Take the question of security .



I do n't think the U.N .
5,5 org|0,0 per


would want to take on that , '' Annan said .
8,8 per


`` There has been a suggestion that the U.N .
8,8 org


wanted to take over the whole Iraq and run it , which was also not the case . ''
6,6 gpe|9,9 gpe

2,3 org|15,15 per


The proposed draft resolution would probably face resistance from other U.N . Security Council members who have favored a U.N .

3,3 per

2,2 per|10,10 per|16,16 per|24,25 per

6,6 per

22,22 per

Krispy Kreme -- At Least we Have Consensus



Byrne
0,0 per


2005-01-05T19 :01:00



Well , we do n't , but we 've something very much like it : A company hitting and then rehitting lows that would have been unthinkable even after their pull-back a year ago , accusations and proof of some less-than-Kosher accounting , and , best of all , allegations of egregious self-dealing by insiders .
2,2 per|7,7 per|16,16 org|29,29 org|54,54 per


A glance at the analyst opinions shows that they have a lone bull cheerleading the stock , and plenty of bears hammering it .
4,4 per|8,8 org|12,12 per|20,20 per


That 's evidence enough that it 's underpriced ; the market usually reacts to a downgrade by dropping the stock a percent or two , but I ca n't help it -- I presume most of these downgrades arose from the classic " Well , what does your analyst think ? " "
48,48 per|26,26 per|32,32 per|47,47 per
47,47 per|48,48 per| per-soc

He says it 's a buy , " " Well , what 's it done this year ? "
0,0 per


conversation .



Nobody wants to be caught recommending a loser , and unlike portfolio managers with a Net Asset Value report card every trading day , analysts can essentially start fresh with each new opinion .
0,0 per|12,12 per|24,24 per|7,7 org


The best analysts get noted , lauded , and showered with cash .
2,2 per


The worst ?
1,1 per


Well , they 're still averaged in with the rest .
2,2 per|9,9 per


And anyway , I do n't consider analysts anything but aggregators of publically-available information and echo - chambers for previously-determined opinions .
7,7 per|10,10 per|17,17 per|3,3 per


They ca n't really add much without straying into the realm of inside information , and what they do add is usually factored in the moment the report is released .
0,0 per|17,17 per


Or , in an ideal world , it should be .
5,5 loc


Thankfully , ours is a less-than-ideal , though by no means dystopic , market , so we get plenty of opportunities to profit from the mistakes of others .
27,27 per|2,2 per|16,16 per


As long as the bearish opinions of analysts weighs down on Krispy Kreme , I 'll be a bull .

Did anyone see the Packers game Sunday ?



Mark Backer
0,1 per


2004-12-20T09 :19:00



While it was entertaining , that 's not why I 'm posting about it .
9,9 per


I do n't normally post about pro football , but what I saw deserved a ranting or two , and I suspect it 's going to get many more in the days and weeks to come .
0,0 per|11,11 per|20,20 per


With 4:41 left in the fourth quarter and the Packers down by 11 , Favre hit Robert Ferguson with a 31 yard strike near the left hash marks .
9,9 org|14,14 per|16,17 per


Coming from the other direction , Jacksonville DB Donovin Darius unloaded chin high on Ferguson with a vicious clothesline .
6,6 org|7,7 per|8,9 per|14,14 per
7,7 per|6,6 org| org-aff

Remarkably , Ferguson held on to the ball , despite being disjoined from his helmet on the hit .
13,13 per|2,2 per


After many minutes lying motionless on the field , Ferguson was finally removed via stretcher , giving a thumbs up to the crowd on the way out .
9,9 per|7,7 fac|22,22 per
9,9 per|7,7 fac| phys

The Packers went on to lose the game , but that 's not the story here .
1,1 org


This was not one of the staged stiff-armed clotheslines you see in professional wrestling broadcasts .
9,9 per


This was a vicious , arm cocked and swinging clothesline that literally could have torn Ferguson 's head off of his body .
15,15 per|20,20 per


The play was immediately flagged , and moments later it was announced that Darius had been ejected , much to the crowd 's delight .
13,13 per|21,21 per


One sidenote here is that , despite their rabid fandom and the situation , not one thing was thrown at the offending player as he left the field .
22,22 per|24,24 per|27,27 fac|7,7 per


It would have been easy to bathe him in beer or snowballs or batteries as he left , but the Packer fans are classier than that .
20,20 org|7,7 per|15,15 per|21,21 per


To a person , they acted with class , using their voices and not projectiles to express their displeasure .
2,2 per|4,4 per|10,10 per|17,17 per


This was the most vicious and blatantly dirty play I have seen in the NFL since Jim McMahon was body slammed to the ground in the mid 80 's about five seconds after he had released a pass .
14,14 org|16,17 per|33,33 per|9,9 per

3,5 per|2,2 per|1,1 org|15,15 per|17,17 per|7,7 per

Nostalgia Alert



Byrne
0,0 per


2005-02-05T13 :58:00



I really miss the days when a major international oil company could basically buy some tiny , ill-established foreign government to get at it s natural resources .
23,23 gpe|19,19 gpe|0,0 per|10,10 org

Where is Investigative Journalism ?



Will Vehrs
0,1 per


2005-02-27T12 :38:00



Governor Mark Warner has turned state government upside-down in an effort to do more business with small , women , and minority owned ( SWAM ) firms and the thanks he gets are headlines like this one in the Daily Press : Warner 's plan to raise contracting diversity falls short .
26,26 org|1,2 per|0,0 per|30,30 per|42,42 per|21,21 per|6,6 gpe|5,5 gpe|18,18 per
18,18 per|26,26 org| org-aff|21,21 per|26,26 org| org-aff

The article is full of innuendo that procurement officals are ignoring the Governor 's wishes and just waiting for him to leave office , that " special deals " are cut with non - SWAM vendors , and that somehow the electronic procurement system is " stacked " against SWAM firms .
49,49 org|50,50 org|34,34 org|12,12 per|19,19 per|8,8 per|35,35 org


If true , these are serious charges , worthy of high-level investigation .



What 's missing from the article , though , is any attempt at investigative journalism to give even one factual example supporting the innuendo .



What 's also missing is a fair-minded review of whether the sagging numbers reported for SWAM procurement are valid .
15,15 org


Someday a journalist is going to take the time to watch a sample number of SWAM firms submit bids on openly posted contracts , then use procurement tools that are in place to determine if any SWAM firms were unfairly denied contracts they deserved .
15,15 org|36,36 org|2,2 per|16,16 org|42,42 org|37,37 org


Until then , this carping appears to be sour grapes .



Governor Warner has done plenty to open up the system to SWAM firms and give them a presumptive advantage , even inviting a backlash by non - SWAM firms .
12,12 org|11,11 org|15,15 org|27,27 org|1,1 per|0,0 per|28,28 org


Maybe SWAM firms are n't doing all they can to return the Governor 's faith in them .
2,2 org|1,1 org|7,7 org|16,16 org|12,12 per

11,11 per|10,10 org| org-aff|4,4 fac|6,6 gpe| part-whole

1,1 fac

4,4 gpe|7,8 per|1,1 per|5,5 org

5,5 gpe|10,10 gpe|1,1 fac


technology , has been plagued by frequent , non-nuclear malfunctions since testing began in November 2000 .

Emboldened by U.N. report , Iraq calls for end to sanctions



BAGHDAD , Iraq ( AP )
0,0 gpe|2,2 gpe|4,4 org
0,0 gpe|2,2 gpe| part-whole

Emboldened by the latest weapons inspectors ' report , Iraq on Saturday called on the United Nations to remove crippling sanctions and to ban weapons of mass destruction in the entire Middle East _ and eventually in the United States .
38,39 gpe|4,4 wea|9,9 gpe|5,5 per|15,16 org|24,24 wea|31,32 gpe


Iraq resumed destroying banned Al Samoud 2 missiles under U.N .
0,0 gpe|4,6 wea|7,7 wea|9,9 org


supervision Saturday after taking a day off , crushing six more in a process that chief inspector Hans Blix called a `` substantial measure of disarmament . ''
17,18 per|16,16 per|10,10 wea


In the past week , Iraq has destroyed 40 of its 100 Al Samoud 2 missiles , prohibited by the United Nations because some tests indicated they could fly farther than 150 kilometers ( 93 miles ) .
8,8 wea|5,5 gpe|10,10 gpe|15,15 wea|26,26 wea|12,14 wea|20,21 org
10,10 gpe|15,15 wea| art

It also has been destroying equipment used to make them .
0,0 gpe|9,9 wea


Reports to the Security Council on Friday by Blix and chief nuclear inspector Mohammed ElBaradei praised Iraq 's recent compliance .
8,8 per|3,4 org|13,14 per|12,12 per|16,16 gpe


But inspectors also questioned Iraq 's motivation , as it began to give the inspectors what they wanted only when the threat of war became immediate .
4,4 gpe|9,9 gpe|1,1 per|14,14 per|16,16 per


U.S . President George W. Bush said the reports indicated that only a war will make Iraq disarm .
3,5 per|2,2 per|0,0 gpe|16,16 gpe
2,2 per|0,0 gpe| org-aff

`` Unfortunately , it is clear that Saddam Hussein is still violating the demands of the United Nations by refusing to disarm , '' he told Americans in a radio address Saturday .
24,24 per|26,26 gpe|7,8 per|16,17 org


Iraq , however , took the report as an endorsement of its work and argued not only that war plans should be canceled , but that sanctions imposed on it by the Security Council for its 1990 invasion of Kuwait should be removed .
32,33 org|39,39 gpe|0,0 gpe|11,11 gpe|29,29 gpe|35,35 gpe


`` We demand that the Security Council and the world decide on ... the lifting of sanctions on Iraq in a comprehensive and complete way , '' said a spokesman for a meeting Saturday of Saddam and top-level officials , quoted by official Iraqi news media .
5,6 org|35,35 per|9,9 loc|29,29 per|38,38 per|45,45 org|18,18 gpe|43,43 gpe|1,1 gpe
45,45 org|43,43 gpe| part-whole

The unidentified spokesman claimed the weapons inspectors had verified Iraq has rid itself of weapons of mass destruction _ something the inspectors said would take months to do _ and appealed for a ban on such weapons to be extended beyond Iraq : to Israel , and eventually to the United States .

13,14 org|1,1 per|9,9 gpe|27,27 gpe|22,22 wea|32,32 wea|19,20 gpe


`` At the front of those that must be rid of these weapons is the Zionist entity , '' he said in a reference to Israel , adding that the order should `` move on after this region to America . ''

peacekeeping , Annan personally refused requests to authorize U.N . peacekeepers in Rwanda to seize weapons and prevent genocide .

OIADVANTAGE_20050108 .1323



WEB TEXT



2005-01-08T13 :23:00



Shareholders Benefit from Employer Reputation



John A
0,1 per


2005-01-08T13 :23:00



It is just about time for Fortune magazine to release its 2005 list of 100 Best Companies to Work For .
6,7 org|10,10 org|16,16 org


So now is a good time to ask a simple question : Why should we care ?
14,14 per


Making this list is certainly a source of pride .



It can also be helpful if you are looking for a nice new job .
6,6 per


Should anyone else pay attention to this list ?
1,1 per


Well , thanks for asking because I just happen to have an answer for that question .
6,6 per


It turns out that investors can benefit by paying attention to this list as well .
4,4 per


In a study published in the Journal of Business Finance &amp; Accounting ( 2003 , 30:771 -798 ) , Greg Filbeck and Dianna Preece found that companies on the Fortune list of 100 Best Companies to Work For outperformed a matched sample of firms along multiple measures of return .
29,29 org|41,41 org|43,43 org|34,34 org|26,26 org|6,11 org|19,20 per|22,23 per


This study is particularly relevant for investors because the authors measured return after the list was announced .
9,9 per|6,6 per


To often these studies use as a starting point the moment before information becomes public .



The only way to benefit from such information is by holding the stock before the information becomes public .



This study indicates that the Best Companies to Work For information may still be useful even after the information becomes public .
6,6 org


It might also be useful to look at companies that have consistently made the list in the previous few years and make an educated guess about their inclusion on this year 's list .
8,8 org|9,9 org|26,26 org


Search the news archives and see if in the past year the company did anything that might have totally pissed off their employees .
12,12 org|21,21 org|22,22 per
22,22 per|21,21 org| org-aff

Massive layoffs , bitter union battles , stopped offering free massages , etc. .
4,4 org


You might also want to be wary if the CEO or a bunch of other top executives have been replaced .
9,9 per|12,12 per|16,16 per|0,0 per


That can often generate a period of uncertainty in a workforce .
10,10 per

0,1 per


2005-01-05T09 :22:00

5,6 org|18,18 org


If you are interested in getting information about securities class actions for a company , you should check out the Stanford Law School 's Securities Class Action Clearinghouse .
1,1 per|15,15 per|13,13 org|20,22 org|24,27 org
24,27 org|20,22 org| part-whole

This site has a very easy to use search function and it might be worth the time to run a quick check on companies of interest to you as possible investments .
27,27 per|23,23 org
27,27 per|23,23 org| org-aff

Researchers affiliated with the clearinghouse just released an interesting report about securities class action trends during 2004 .
4,4 org|0,0 per
0,0 per|4,4 org| org-aff

The results highlight trends in types of filings ( increase in product market related filings ) , affected sectors ( big increase in energy &amp; technology sector ) , and overall number of filings ( fairly steady ) .

China to build nuclear-powered desalinator project



JINAN , June 24 ( Xinhua )
0,0 gpe|5,5 org


China late this year will start building a nuclear-powered desalinator project in Yantai City in east China 's Shandong Province , with a designed capacity of producing 52 million tons of fresh water a year .
0,0 gpe|12,13 gpe|16,16 loc|18,19 gpe
12,13 gpe|18,19 gpe| part-whole|18,19 gpe|16,16 loc| part-whole

Officials with the Development Planning Commission of the Shandong provincial government said the project , to be built in cooperation with Qinghua University , would alleviate water shortages in the city and other parts of the Shandong Peninsula .
33,33 loc|30,30 gpe|36,37 gpe|10,10 gpe|8,8 gpe|0,0 per|3,5 org|21,22 org
0,0 per|3,5 org| org-aff|3,5 org|10,10 gpe| part-whole|33,33 loc|36,37 gpe| part-whole

Yantai and other parts of Shandong suffered acute water shortages due to droughts in recent years , changing climate and other reasons .
3,3 loc|0,0 gpe|5,5 gpe
3,3 loc|5,5 gpe| part-whole

Approved by the State Development and Reform Commission , the project is expected to cost 1.6 billion yuan ( nearly 200 million US dollars ) .
3,7 org|22,22 gpe


Zhang Zuoyi , director of the Nuclear Energy Technology and Design Institute attached to Qinghua University , was quoted in Monday 's Beijing Evening News as saying the fresh water to be produced from the project will cost 3.75 yuan per ton , much less than the cost of water from existing sources .
0,1 per|3,3 per|6,11 org|22,24 org|14,15 org
6,11 org|14,15 org| part-whole

The project is expected to use a 200-megawatt nuclear-powered reactor designed by the institute , according to the paper .
13,13 org|18,18 org


The project would be completed and operational in 2007 , it said .
10,10 org

5,5 per|0,1 per|4,4 gpe

27,27 per|30,30 veh|0,0 gpe|24,24 wea

APW_ENG_20030610 .0554



NEWS STORY



20030610



Mars rover is launched on voyage to look for evidence of water



CAPE CANAVERAL , Florida ( AP )
0,1 gpe|3,3 gpe|5,5 org


A rocket holding the first of two Mars rovers blasted off Tuesday on a seven-month voyage to the red planet where the golf-cart - sized vehicles will search for evidence that there was once enough water to support life on Mars .
7,7 loc|19,19 loc|20,20 loc|40,40 loc|8,8 veh|25,25 veh|1,1 veh|4,4 veh|22,22 veh
1,1 veh|4,4 veh| part-whole

The rover named Spirit lifted off from the Cape Canaveral Air Force Station aboard a Boeing Delta II rocket at 1:58 p.m. ( 1758 GMT ) .
15,15 org|18,18 veh|16,17 veh|1,1 veh|3,3 veh|8,12 fac
15,15 org|18,18 veh| art|1,1 veh|18,18 veh| part-whole

Thunderstorms delayed the launch by two days , and launch officials contended with a last-minute communications glitch between stations that will track the spacecraft .
10,10 per|18,18 fac|19,19 fac|23,23 veh


The second rover , named Opportunity , will be launched later this month , and both are expected to arrive at Mars in January .
2,2 veh|5,5 veh|21,21 loc|15,15 veh


Moving on six wheels , the $ 800 million rovers act as robotic geologists .
9,9 veh|13,13 veh


Each is equipped with a panoramic camera , a camera for close-up views of rocks and a drill to cut into rocks .
0,0 veh


The data will be transmitted back to Earth .
7,7 loc


Previous missions have shown Mars had water in the past , but scientists want to find out how long the water was there and in what quantities .
12,12 per|4,4 loc|22,22 loc


Scientists believe the water may show that Mars once was able to support life .
0,0 per|7,7 loc


The rovers ' landing sites , on opposite sides of the planet , were chosen for their likelihood of holding evidence of water .
8,8 loc|11,11 loc|1,1 veh|4,4 loc|16,16 loc
8,8 loc|11,11 loc| part-whole

Studying the minerals in rocks can tell scientists how the rocks were formed , whether they were ever submerged in water , and whether hot water ever ran over them .
7,7 per


The rovers are expected to travel up to 132 feet ( 39.6 meters ) each Martian day , which is 24 hours and 39 { minutes long .
15,15 loc|1,1 veh


The missions are expected to last three months but could run longer .



The rovers eventually will shut down as dust builds up on their solar panels and they will remain on the planet .
20,20 loc|1,1 veh|15,15 veh|11,11 veh


Only 12 out of 30 previous attempts have reached Mars , and only three out of nine attempts have succeeded in landing on the planet .
24,24 loc|9,9 loc


NASA revamped its Mars program after the failure of two unmanned missions to Mars four years ago .
0,0 org|2,2 org|3,3 loc|13,13 loc


The space agency has been under intense scrutiny since February when the space shuttle Columbia disintegrated over Texas , killing all seven crew members .
2,2 org|14,14 veh|13,13 veh|17,17 gpe|23,23 per

A logo patch of that last Columbia mission was attached to both Mars rovers .

HONG KONG , March 27 ( Xinhua )
0,1 gpe|6,6 org


The Hong Kong Polytechnic University ( PolyU ) presented its " Outstanding Alumni Award " to five alumni here Thursday to pay tribute to their remarkable professional achievements and significant contributions to their alma mater and the community .
18,18 gpe|1,4 org|9,9 org|34,34 org|6,6 org|17,17 per|24,24 per|32,32 per

16,18 per|20,20 per|22,22 per|24,27 org|29,31 per|33,33 per|36,36 per|38,40 org|42,43 per|45,45 per|48,48 per|50,57 org|60,62 per|66,66 per|69,73 org|1,3 per|0,0 per|6,9 org|11,12 org|14,14 gpe

A Pitiful , Helpless Giant



Will Vehrs
0,1 per


2005-02-22T13 :48:00



Anyone who has spent any time in NVA over the last 40 years is familiar with the Giant grocery store chain .
0,0 per|1,1 per|7,7 loc|19,19 org|20,20 org|17,17 org
1,1 per|7,7 loc| phys

When the chain passed from its private owners a few years ago , problems began .
7,7 per|5,5 org|2,2 org
7,7 per|5,5 org| org-aff

These problems multiplied when the New England chain Stop n ' Shop acquired Giant .
13,13 org|8,11 org|7,7 org|5,6 loc
7,7 org|5,6 loc| gen-aff

Add new competition -- Food Lion , Harris Teeter , and Wegman 's -- and loyalty to Giant , once an article of faith , is dissipating .
17,17 org|11,12 org|7,8 org|4,5 org


It 's a cautionary tale for business and for any long-standing organization seeking to change .
6,6 org|11,11 org


Michael Barbaro has an article on Giant 's recent problems in the Washington Post , plus he took questions online today .
0,1 per|16,16 per|12,13 org|6,6 org


One interesting note : most of the online negative comments about Giant come from Maryland residents .
15,15 per|14,14 gpe|11,11 org
15,15 per|14,14 gpe| gen-aff

Most of the new stores competing with Giant are in Virginia .

20030423



Singapore extends use of SARS thermal scanners to include checkpoints with Malaysia



SINGAPORE ( AP )
0,0 gpe|2,2 org


Singapore authorities extended the use of its state-of-the-art thermal imaging scanner to fight the deadly SARS virus by placing units at its border with Malaysia .
6,6 gpe|21,21 gpe|0,0 gpe|1,1 per|24,24 gpe|22,22 loc
22,22 loc|21,21 gpe| part-whole|1,1 per|0,0 gpe| org-aff|22,22 loc|24,24 gpe| part-whole

The Immigration and Checkpoints Authority said it began a trial of the scanners Wednesday at its Woodlands and Tuas checkpoints to screen for people suffering from severe acute respiratory syndrome .
16,16 loc|18,18 loc|15,15 org|1,4 org|6,6 org|23,23 per|19,19 fac
15,15 org|19,19 fac| art

Nine scanners , developed locally for military purposes , were placed at Singapore 's Changi Airport last week to check people arriving from SARS-affected countries .
6,6 org|14,15 fac|20,20 per|24,24 gpe|12,12 gpe
14,15 fac|12,12 gpe| part-whole|20,20 per|24,24 gpe| gen-aff

Those who show up on the camera screen as `` hot bodies , '' or with a temperature greater than 37.5 degrees Celsius ( 99.5 degrees Fahrenheit ) , will be pulled aside .
0,0 per|1,1 per


Each day about 90,000 people cross the border between Malaysia and Singapore .
4,4 per|11,11 gpe|9,9 gpe|7,7 loc
7,7 loc|11,11 gpe| part-whole|7,7 loc|9,9 gpe| part-whole|4,4 per|7,7 loc| phys

Any person found to be entering Singapore with a high temperature would be directed to a nearby nurse station for further checks .
18,18 fac|1,1 per|17,17 per|6,6 gpe
1,1 per|6,6 gpe| phys|1,1 per|18,18 fac| phys

Singapore has reported 16 deaths , the world 's third-highest toll , out of 186 infected from the flu-like illness .
7,7 loc|14,14 per|0,0 gpe
14,14 per|0,0 gpe| phys

Globally , at least 236 people have died and more than 4,000 have become sickened with the illness .
5,5 per|11,11 per


Immigration and Checkpoints Authority spokeswoman Ngoon Pei Ling said during the trial period the scanners would be placed at bus checkpoints , where passengers are already required to disembark for immigration purposes .
23,23 per|0,3 org|19,19 veh|5,7 per|4,4 per|20,20 fac|22,22 fac
4,4 per|0,3 org| org-aff|23,23 per|22,22 fac| phys

Stalemate at the Security Council ; Washington warns it may bypass UN = ( PICTURES + GRAPHIC ) =



UNITED NATIONS , March 14 ( AFP )
0,1 fac|6,6 org


Efforts were to continue at the United Nations Friday to find a breakthrough in the diplomatic stalemate on Iraq , with Washington warning it could bypass the Security Council and go to war alone .
21,21 gpe|23,23 gpe|18,18 gpe|6,7 fac|27,28 org


With marathon talks at the top world body failing late Thursday to reconcile French and Russian opposition to US - British war plans , the United States upped its military presence , deploying more missile - firing warships to the Red Sea .
18,18 gpe|25,26 gpe|28,28 gpe|20,20 gpe|7,7 fac|13,13 gpe|15,15 gpe|29,29 org|37,37 veh|40,41 loc|34,34 wea


Six non-permanent members of the Security Council considered to be in the middle ground between the fiercely pro- and anti-war camps , were working on new proposals to break the deadlock , France 's ambassador to the UN said . "
2,2 gpe|34,34 per|5,6 org|32,32 gpe|37,37 org
2,2 gpe|5,6 org| org-aff|34,34 per|32,32 gpe| org-aff|34,34 per|37,37 org| org-aff

The six are now working on a paper and we will see the outcome of that consultation , maybe tomorrow ( Friday ) " Jean-Marc de La Sabliere told reporters .
1,1 gpe|24,27 per|9,9 per|29,29 per


Iraq was due to present a 30-page report on biological weapons it said it destroyed in 1991 , according to diplomatic sources in Baghdad , who said a second batch of documents on anthrax would follow in the next few days .

21,21 per|23,23 gpe| phys|11,11 gpe|10,10 wea| art

Amid talk of delaying or even shelving a US - British resolution giving Iraqi President Saddam Hussein until Monday to disarm or face war , oil prices in Asia pulled back , shares rose and the US dollar eased .
8,8 gpe|36,36 gpe|10,10 gpe|13,13 gpe|15,16 per|14,14 per|28,28 gpe
14,14 per|13,13 gpe| org-aff

British efforts to provide a way out of the diplomatic mire at the United Nations ended without agreement late Thursday , but with London 's ambassador to the UN , Jeremy Greenstock , saying he expected talks to go on into the weekend .
0,0 gpe|23,23 gpe|25,25 per|30,31 per|34,34 per|13,14 org|28,28 org
25,25 per|23,23 gpe| org-aff|25,25 per|28,28 org| org-aff

His US counterpart , John Negroponte , said : " I ca n't say we are much farther along today than we were yesterday , " after hours of talks on six British benchmarks to test Iraq 's compliance with council demands .

2,2 per|1,1 gpe| org-aff|0,0 per|2,2 per| per-soc

The tests were designed to sway six uncommitted council members behind a draft resolution which would declare that Iraq has missed its last chance to disarm peacefully unless the council decides otherwise by Monday .
9,9 gpe|18,18 gpe|21,21 gpe|8,8 org|29,29 org
9,9 gpe|8,8 org| org-aff

The two allies would not push for a vote Friday on the draft resolution , diplomats at the United Nations said , while US Secretary of State Colin Powell hinted that Washington would consider not even putting the text to a vote . "

24,24 per|26,26 org| org-aff

0,0 gpe|9,9 org|47,47 per|6,6 gpe|36,36 gpe
6,6 gpe|9,9 org| org-aff

We will be examining them today , tomorrow and into the weekend , " he said late Thursday .
0,0 gpe|14,14 per


Diplomatic wrangling has centred around the French and Russian r efusal to put their names to any resolution allowing the United States to unleash its military might against Iraq before weapons inspections have run their course .
20,21 gpe|24,24 gpe|28,28 gpe|6,6 gpe|8,9 gpe|13,13 gpe|30,30 wea|25,25 org


France has provoked Washington 's ire in its steadfast insistence that it will veto any resolution paving the way for war , even rejecting the British proposals for concrete tests before Baghdad had done so .
3,3 gpe|25,25 gpe|31,31 gpe|0,0 gpe|7,7 gpe|11,11 gpe


France 's threat to cast its veto was only making war more likely , British Foreign Secretary Jack Straw said . "
14,14 gpe|0,0 gpe|5,5 gpe|17,18 per|16,16 per
16,16 per|14,14 gpe| org-aff

Unfortunately they appear to have made the decision not to enforce ( UN resolution ) 1441 , " Straw told Britain 's The Guardian newspaper . "
20,20 gpe|1,1 gpe|18,18 per|12,12 org|22,24 org
22,24 org|20,20 gpe| gen-aff

That renders it less likely that we get a peaceful outcome . "
6,6 per


Russian Deputy Foreign Minister Yury Fedotov said the US decision to drop demands for a Security Council vote this week on war with Iraq showed the resolution had not won enough support .
8,8 gpe|23,23 gpe|15,16 org|0,0 gpe|4,5 per|3,3 per
3,3 per|0,0 gpe| org-aff

He rejected the British proposals , saying : " The British proposals on Iraq are not constructive and do not resolve the key problem , the prevention of a military scenario involving Baghdad , " the Interfax news agency reported .
3,3 gpe|10,10 gpe|13,13 gpe|32,32 gpe|0,0 per|36,38 org|29,29 org


He repeated that Moscow would not back a resolution that authorised an attack against Iraq : " It is not necessary now to adopt any new resolution on Iraq , especially resolutions which lead to war . "
14,14 gpe|28,28 gpe|3,3 gpe|0,0 per


His comments were echoed by the German ambassador to the UN , Gunter Pleuger , who said : " There is no majority support for the British proposal . "
26,26 gpe|10,10 org|0,0 per|7,7 per|12,13 per|15,15 per|6,6 gpe
7,7 per|6,6 gpe| org-aff|7,7 per|10,10 org| org-aff

In Germany , Chancellor Gerhard Schroeder said that weapons inspectors had to be allowed to continue their work . "
8,8 wea|1,1 gpe|4,5 per|3,3 per|9,9 per|16,16 per
4,5 per|1,1 gpe| phys

Together with our friends in France , with Russia , China and the majority of the security council we are confident the disarmament of Iraq can be achieved through peaceful means , " Schroeder said .

13,13 per|16,17 org| org-aff

The British - US proposal needs nine votes to pass through the 15 - member Security Council -- a feat looking increasingly unlikely with France and Russia vowing to veto the resolution and Syria , China and Germany all opposing .
3,3 gpe|1,1 gpe|15,16 org|14,14 gpe|24,24 gpe|26,26 gpe|37,37 gpe|35,35 gpe|33,33 gpe|38,38 gpe

MARKETVIEW_20050204 .1337



WEB TEXT



2005-02-04T13 :37:00



The " Twin Deficits " Myth



Byrne
0,0 per


2005-02-04T13 :37:00



According to the usually reliable CNN / Money , the " Twin Deficits " will continue to grow .
5,5 org


Interesting terminology ... I believe they 're referring to the budget deficit and ... the capital surplus ?
5,5 org|3,3 per


When analyzing trade deficits , it 's important to realize that the amount by which imports exceed exports is also equal to the net amount foreign investors have bet on the US .
31,31 gpe|26,26 per


So the trade deficit is due to a confluence of the pressures from US consumers ( who control about 20 % of global GDP ) and everybody else ( excluding the non-consumption share of US GDP , that would amount to around 75 % of global GDP ) .
13,13 gpe|34,34 gpe|14,14 per|16,16 per|26,26 per
14,14 per|13,13 gpe| gen-aff

Which of those is -- probably -- going to be a more important number ?



Even if we are consumers bent on gorging ourselves with imported goods , the largest pressure on the deficit is that we 're simply a better place for investment -- higher returns on capital in developing countries are more than mitigated by the higher political risks they face .
8,8 gpe|26,26 gpe|21,21 gpe|2,2 gpe|4,4 gpe|36,36 gpe|46,46 gpe


And what about that other deficit ?



It , of course , is the ominous sum that we fund without taxes , but by borrowing funds .
10,10 gpe


And about half of those borrowings end up with the major banks in Asia .
11,11 org|13,13 gpe
11,11 org|13,13 gpe| gen-aff

So , not to be a heretic , but 1 ) We 're issuing them at relatively low interest rates , 2 ) Inflation is bound to pick up eventually , and so 3 ) Would n't you rather have our deficits made up by economically nonsensical purchases by non - US investors , rather than raising taxes in America ?
11,11 gpe|40,40 gpe|51,51 gpe|59,59 gpe|52,52 per|37,37 per
52,52 per|51,51 gpe| gen-aff

It 's a question of who will pay for the same spending , and all else being equal I 'd be happy for Asian central banks to pick up the tab .
25,25 org|23,23 gpe|5,5 per|18,18 per
25,25 org|23,23 gpe| gen-aff

The Twin Deficits are a reality , but they are n't exactly a terrifying one .

AFP_ENG_20030311 .0491



NEWS STORY



20030311



Sotheby 's , Christie 's pay 40 million dollars over antitrust suits



NEW YORK , March 11 ( AFP )
0,1 gpe|6,6 org


The world 's most powerful fine art auction houses , Sotheby 's and Christie 's , have agreed to pay 40 million dollars to settle an international price-fixing scam , Sotheby 's said .
8,8 org|10,11 org|30,31 org|13,14 org|1,1 loc
8,8 org|1,1 loc| gen-aff

The payment , if approved by the courts , would settle a slew of suits by clients over auctions held between 1993 and 2000 outside the United States , it said in a statement . "
26,27 gpe|7,7 org|29,29 org|16,16 per


Under the terms of the settlement agreement , Sotheby 's and Christie 's will each pay 20 million dollars , " said Sotheby 's , which operates in 34 countries .
14,14 org|8,9 org|22,23 org|25,25 org|11,12 org|29,29 gpe
25,25 org|29,29 gpe| gen-aff

The deal required threatened British and Canadian claims against both auction houses to be dropped .
4,4 gpe|6,6 gpe|11,11 org


Buyers and sellers also would have to agree not to pursue further cases in foreign courts .
0,0 per|2,2 per|15,15 org


The litigation covers buyers in auctions outside the United States between January 1 , 1993 and February 7 , 2000 , and sellers between September 1 , 1995 and February 7 , 2000 .
3,3 per|22,22 per|8,9 gpe


Similar claims over US - based auctions were settled in an agreement struck in September 2000 for a total of 512 million dollars .
3,3 gpe


In December 2001 , a Manhattan jury convicted Sotheby 's main shareholder and former chairman Alfred Taubman of entering into a price-fixing agreement with Christie 's .
6,6 per|5,5 gpe|15,16 per|11,11 per|14,14 per|8,9 org|24,25 org
6,6 per|5,5 gpe| gen-aff|11,11 per|8,9 org| org-aff|14,14 per|8,9 org| org-aff

Four months later , the billionaire was sentenced to one year in prison and a 7.5-million-dollar fine over the price-fixing , which prosecutors said had cost clients of both firms 400 million dollars .
5,5 per|12,12 fac|22,22 per|29,29 org|26,26 per
5,5 per|12,12 fac| phys

Christie 's was not prosecuted in the United States after its management agreed to testify against Sotheby 's and provide documents needed to prove fraudulent intent .
7,8 gpe|11,11 per|16,17 org|0,1 org|10,10 org
11,11 per|10,10 org| org-aff

Together , Sotheby 's and Christie 's control more than 90 percent of the fine art and antiques market .
2,3 org|5,6 org


Sotheby 's said it would record the 20-million-dollar settlement as a special charge for 2002 .
0,1 org|3,3 org


It would be funded in two payments of 10 million dollars each upon preliminary and final court approval .
16,16 org

Major US insurance group AIG is in the final stage of talks to take over General Electric 's Japanese life insurance arm in a deal to create Japan 's sixth largest life insurer , reports said Wednesday .

0,3 org


is likely to acquire all shares in GE Edison Life Insurance by the end of September and also take over GE 's US car and fire insurance operations , the reports said .

15,15 org|12,12 org| part-whole|28,28 org|31,31 gpe| gen-aff

34,34 org|32,32 org|5,5 org|7,7 org|13,14 org|16,16 org|21,22 org

MAG : Arafat Skimmed $ 2 Million a Month From the Gas Trade Sun Nov 14 2004 09:53:40 ET New York
2,2 per|0,0 org|19,20 gpe


-- Last year auditors discovered Arafat was guilty of skimming $ 2 million a month from the gasoline trade in the territories , TIME reports.In August 2002 international donors forced Arafat to sign over his investments to the Palestine Investment Fund , which was audited by U.S . accountants and managed by Palestinian Finance Minister Salam Fayyad , a former International Monetary Fund official .
3,3 per|21,21 gpe|52,52 gpe|23,23 org|5,5 per|30,30 per|34,34 per|28,28 per|38,40 org|42,42 org|46,46 gpe|48,48 per|55,56 per|63,63 per|54,54 per|60,62 org
48,48 per|46,46 gpe| gen-aff|54,54 per|52,52 gpe| org-aff|63,63 per|60,62 org| org-aff

After scouring corporations throughout the Arab world and bank accounts in the Cayman Islands and Luxembourg , the auditors identified $ 800 million , which has been made a part of the Palestinian Authority 's official budget .
18,18 per|32,33 gpe|6,6 loc|2,2 org|8,8 org|15,15 gpe|12,13 loc|5,5 per
2,2 org|6,6 loc| gen-aff|5,5 per|6,6 loc| gen-aff

It 's the most successful financial reform in the Arab world , -- Jim Prince , president of the Los Angeles - based Democracy Council and head of the audit team , tells TIME .
30,30 per|33,33 org|10,10 loc|13,14 per|16,16 per|26,26 per|23,24 org|19,20 gpe|9,9 per
16,16 per|23,24 org| org-aff|23,24 org|19,20 gpe| gen-aff

People close to Fayyad 's investigation told TIME of Arafat 's skimming from the gas trade .
7,7 org|9,9 per|3,3 per|0,0 per

Mark Backer
0,1 per


2004-11-03T13 :00:00



I am 36 years old .
0,0 per


I 've been around a while .
0,0 per


I 'm not 87 or anything , but I 've seen some things in my life .

I have initially agreed and disagreed with different things over the years , only to have my mind changed later .
0,0 per|16,16 per


However , I will never EVER change my mind about the idiocy we call Daylight Savings Time .
2,2 per|7,7 per|12,12 per


I Googled " Daylight Savings Time " and I got the following link :
0,0 per|8,8 per


http://webexhibits.org/daylightsaving/



I started reading ...
0,0 per


The site says things like " We 've learned to save energy and enjoy sunny summer evenings by switching our clocks an hour forward in the summer " and there 's no S at the end of Savings .
6,6 per|19,19 per


It should be Daylight Saving Time .



My apologies to the assclowns that invented this idiocy and the goobers that perpetuate it in such a ridiculous fashion .
0,0 per|4,4 per|5,5 per|11,11 per|12,12 per


I will concede that " springing forward " and " falling back " are good ways to remember to change the batteries in your smoke detectors .
0,0 per|23,23 per


However , New Years and the Fourth of July would do the same thing .



I kept reading the website of propoganda and found that the first person to come up with the idea was Benjamin Franklin who did it on behalf of some friends that owned oil companies ( oil was used in lamps ) .
12,12 per|20,21 per|22,22 per|29,29 per|30,30 per|33,33 org|0,0 per
30,30 per|33,33 org| org-aff|22,22 per|29,29 per| per-soc

I assume that , because the idea was dumb and inconvenient , lots of people ignored it . "
14,14 per|0,0 per


By 1966 , some 100 million Americans were observing DST based on their own local laws and customs .
6,6 per|12,12 per


Congress decided to step in to end the confusion and establish one pattern across the country .
0,0 org|15,15 gpe


The Uniform Time Act of 1966 ( 15 U.S. Code Section 260a ) which was signed into Public Law 89-387 on 12 April 1966 , by President Lyndon Johnson , created Daylight Saving Tim to begin on the last Sunday of April and to end on the last Sunday of October .
8,8 gpe|27,28 per|26,26 per


Any State that wanted to be exempt from DST could do so by passing a state law .
1,1 gpe|2,2 gpe|15,15 gpe

Indiana 's eastern half does n't use it .

.

0,1 per

11,11 per|17,17 org| org-aff

29,29 org|4,4 per|15,15 org|2,2 per|7,7 org|6,6 org|16,16 org|18,18 org|20,21 org|23,23 org|25,25 org|27,27 org

8,8 gpe|1,2 org

3,3 fac|21,21 org

NEWS STORY



20030404



Russia accepts World Bank loan to combat AIDS , tuberculosis



MOSCOW ( AP )
0,0 gpe|2,2 org


Russia has accepted a US$ 150 million World Bank loan to combat the spread of AIDS and tuberculosis , ending a negotiating process that lasted four years , World Bank officials said Friday .
7,8 org|28,29 org|0,0 gpe|30,30 per
30,30 per|28,29 org| org-aff

The World Bank first offered the loan in 1999 , but disagreements over treatment kept the project on hold .
1,2 org


Russia objected to World Bank rules that required monitoring of patients receiving medication , the World Bank said .
3,4 org|15,16 org|0,0 gpe|10,10 per
10,10 per|0,0 gpe| gen-aff

But after drawn-out talks , President Vladimir Putin signed off on the loan , which will take effect this year , the World Bank said .
22,23 org|6,7 per|5,5 per


`` Russia has one of the fastest growing AIDS epidemics in the world '' and has a `` fearsome '' problem with tuberculosis , particularly drug-resistant strains , said Olesoji Adeyi , a World Bank health specialist .
29,30 per|36,36 per|33,34 org|1,1 gpe|12,12 loc
36,36 per|33,34 org| org-aff|1,1 gpe|12,12 loc| part-whole

`` It 's a potential dual epidemic , '' he said , adding that people with immune systems weakened by the AIDS virus are especially vulnerable to contracting TB , which he called an `` opportunistic disease . ''
9,9 per|31,31 per|14,14 per


AIDS came relatively late to Russia , but spread rapidly , primarily due to intravenous drug abuse and a lack of prevention programs .
5,5 gpe


Officials have registered more than 230,000 cases of HIV , though health experts say the actual number of HIV infections tops 1 million .
0,0 per|12,12 per


Tuberculosis , meanwhile , has also emerged as a serious problem , particularly in Russia 's overcrowded prisons .
17,17 fac|14,14 gpe
14,14 gpe|17,17 fac| art

WEB TEXT



2005-01-27T07 :16:00



China : We could always ignore them , right ?



Byrne
0,0 per


2005-01-27T07 :16:00



One of the rules of thumb that has guided my ( limited ) business career from the beginning is that China is never as lucrative as it looks .
26,26 gpe|20,20 gpe|9,9 per


This assumption is based on about 150 years of economic history , including several booms in interest and investment in China .
20,20 gpe


Their biggest problem : There 's usually a 200-to-1 ratio of Nearly Starving Peasant Laborers to Absurdly Well-Off Government Employees .
18,18 gpe|0,0 gpe|14,14 per|19,19 per
19,19 per|18,18 gpe| org-aff

And now it 's an iffier 100-to-1 , since there are also rich private sector employees and the labor force is n't quite so expendable .
15,15 per|19,19 per


What they 've been missing for years was the real driver behind any consumer economy : Consumers .
1,1 gpe|16,16 per|13,13 per


Specifically , they did n't have a real middle class .
2,2 gpe|9,9 per


That 's changed in the last twenty years , as increasing social mobility and a burst in foreign demand has finally made China a genuine , rather than theoretical , contender .
22,22 gpe|30,30 gpe


And they 've even supplied proof of their economic viability , announcing that they 've beaten Japan for exports to the US .
16,16 gpe|21,21 gpe|1,1 gpe|7,7 gpe|13,13 gpe


If only I 'd figured this out in early 2002 , when their stock market was by some stretch of the imagination cheap .
12,12 gpe|2,2 per


Tanger
0,0 per


????



- ??



- ??



T10 :10:00



I dunno if you want anything to do with their stock market .
0,0 per|9,9 gpe|11,11 org|3,3 per
11,11 org|9,9 gpe| gen-aff

For one , its perforance last year was pretty dismal .
3,3 org


More importantly , it s a structural nuthouse .
3,3 org|7,7 org


Unfortunately , minority shareholder rights are virtually non-existent , and excluding the dodgy financial statements listed on the exchange , lots of times companies are more interested in generating cash from an IPO then actually bothering with shareholder value .
3,3 per|23,23 org|37,37 per
37,37 per|23,23 org| org-aff

This Economist article ( not sure if registration is required , sorry )
1,1 org

3,4 org

That 's an annualized return of roughly .4 % .

OIADVANTAGE_20050103 .0944



WEB TEXT



2005-01-03T09 :44:00



It 's Good to be the King !



John A
0,1 per


2005-01-03T09 :44:00



Here 's an entertaining little morsel from Business Week Online ( no byline given ) :
7,8 org


But on the subject of succession , those two look like role models compared with insurance giant American International Group Inc .
8,8 per|12,12 per|17,20 org|16,16 org


( AIG ) , whose aging CEO has no plans to retire .
1,1 org|4,4 org|6,6 per
6,6 per|4,4 org| org-aff

Maurice R. " Hank " Greenberg , who turns 80 in May , groomed two sons to be successors , but both have since left AIG .
25,25 org|0,5 per|7,7 per|15,15 per|18,18 per|21,21 per
0,5 per|15,15 per| per-soc|21,21 per|25,25 org| org-aff

Greenberg Sr .
0,1 per


then created an office of the chairman in 2002 , which includes co-COOs Martin J. Sullivan and Donald P. Kanak .
17,19 per|12,12 per|6,6 per|3,3 per|10,10 per|13,15 per


Both are considered possible successors , but the board wo n't know Greenberg 's preference until his departure , when it opens a sealed letter .
0,0 per|4,4 per|8,8 per|20,20 per|12,12 per|16,16 per


Perhaps this is a good time for a quick refresher .... The CEO works for the board ... end lesson .
16,16 per|12,12 per
12,12 per|16,16 per| per-soc

I guess it is not as straight forward when your CEO is also chairman and one of the largest shareholders .
0,0 per|10,10 per|13,13 per|15,15 per|9,9 per|19,19 per


It would be tempting to get on my high horse right now about the need to separate the positions of CEO and Chairman but to be honest with you I do n't really believe that .
7,7 per|29,29 per|28,28 per|20,20 per|22,22 per


I know CEO / chair duality is a popular cause for corporate governance .
0,0 per|2,2 per|4,4 per


However there is little empirical evidence to suggest that separating these roles affects firm performance in either a positive or negative way .



Having a combined CEO/Chairman does reduce the ability of the board to act as a check on management and this does mean that you need to be more critical in your assessment of the trustworthiness of the top management team .
10,10 per|23,23 per|30,30 per|17,17 per|39,39 per|3,3 per


This downside of having a combined CEO/chair is offset by ( 1 ) a reduction of coordination and communication costs at the top of the organization and ( 2 ) an increase in the negotiating position of the CEO when dealing with suppliers , potential merger partners , etc. # 2 could be particularly useful in a dynamic industry .
38,38 per|42,42 org|46,46 org|6,6 per


I do however look more carefully at the top management team of a company with a CEO/Chair before investing .
0,0 per|13,13 org|10,10 per|16,16 per
16,16 per|13,13 org| org-aff|10,10 per|13,13 org| org-aff

It is important that you can get a sense of the trustworthiness of the CEO .
4,4 per|14,14 per


Is there high turnover among senior managers ?
6,6 per


Is there a record of regulatory problems ?



If the CEO is new , I also look at the performance of the CEO 's previous company .
6,6 per|2,2 per|14,14 per|17,17 org
14,14 per|17,17 org| org-aff

I am most concerned if the fortunes of the prior employer took a sudden turn for the worse after the CEO left .
0,0 per|20,20 per|10,10 org
20,20 per|10,10 org| org-aff

Enron mulls suing banks for bad advice



NEW YORK , May 28 ( AFP )
0,1 gpe|6,6 org


Bankrupt energy giant Enron Corp is considering bringing legal action against its own bankers for giving bad financial advice that helped lead to its downfall , the Wall Street Journal reported Wednesday .
3,4 org|2,2 org|11,11 org|23,23 org|13,13 org|27,29 org


The Houston energy company , which has been the target of a slew of investigations into alleged financial deception , filed a pair of motions in federal bankruptcy court in Manhattan in April , said the daily .
3,3 org|5,5 org|9,9 org|36,36 org|1,1 gpe|28,28 fac|30,30 gpe
3,3 org|1,1 gpe| gen-aff

It added that the move is part of a new push under the leadership of new chief executive officer Stephen Cooper to settle all the litigation involving Enron and its bankers , shareholders and creditors .
27,27 org|29,29 org|30,30 org|0,0 org|32,32 per|34,34 org|19,20 per|18,18 per


Enron 's principal bankers , including JP Morgan Chase and Citigroup , and along with numerous other Enron advisers , have already been sued by the company 's shareholders for allegedly helping the company hide debt , and they face investigations from regulators over their involvement .

22,22 gpe|23,23 org|25,25 org|11,11 per
23,23 org|22,22 gpe| org-aff|25,25 org|22,22 gpe| org-aff

3,3 org|4,4 per|8,8 per|12,12 per|15,15 per
4,4 per|3,3 org| org-aff

11,11 per

14,14 org|1,1 per|3,3 per|4,4 per|5,5 per|15,15 loc

14,14 gpe|16,16 gpe|15,15 gpe|0,0 per

17,17 per|2,3 per|1,1 per

7,7 per|10,10 org| org-aff|17,17 per|16,16 org| org-aff

24,24 org|21,21 org|4,4 per|0,0 per|6,6 per

Gmail : Cachet for Everybody !



Byrne
0,0 per


2005-02-06T19 :51:00



At first , I was pretty skeptical of Gmail -- an announcement of something new , cool , and free , from a quirky company , on April Fool 's Day ?
3,3 per|24,24 org


Turns out my initial attitude was n't justified , of course , and Gmail has been a popular success .
2,2 per


Just this weekend , Google gave many users another fifty invitations , prompting some to speculate that it could be the start of Gmail 's final move out of beta .
4,4 org|7,7 per|13,13 per


Their marketing was absolutely brilliant : Simply through association with Google , and because of the invitation-only membership , they created a product with instant cachet -- something so in demand invitations went for $ 50 on eBay , and one enterprising site even offered a kidney for an invite .
37,37 org|19,19 org|0,0 org|10,10 org


And now ?



Everyone who wants a Gmail account has one , and yet people with invites have an almost pathological desire to give them away .
0,0 per|1,1 per|11,11 per


It 's been nearly a year , the service is nearly ubiquitous , and somehow Google has kept us obsessed with Gmail .
18,18 per|15,15 org


Want an invite ?



I 've got a dozen .

OIADVANTAGE_20050203 .2102



WEB TEXT



2005-02-03T21 :02:00



Beyond Hippies and Tree Huggers



John A
0,1 per


2005-02-03T21 :02:00



Socially responsible investing .



Corporate social responsibility .



Just saying these words seems to elicit some fairly simplistic knee-jerk reactions .



The reaction that I find most amusing is the knowing look of sympathy .
3,3 per


You know , the one that says " Poor naive soul .
10,10 per|0,0 per


If only you understood economics , you would understand the folly of your ways . "
2,2 per|6,6 per|12,12 per


I do not intend to get into the stakeholder vs stockholder debate here or argue the relative merits of Atlas Shrugged .
0,0 per|8,8 per|10,10 per


Those discussions , though interesting , avoid a simpler question .



Do measures of corporate social responsibility contain valuable added information that help investors pick winning investments ?
12,12 per


If all that you have read about this topic is an article in Business Week or The Wall Street Journal , you 've probably heard the standard answer -- the evidence is mixed .
13,14 org|17,19 org|3,3 per|21,21 per


That is true but not very revealing would n't you say ?
9,9 per


Evidence is mixed mostly because ( 1 ) there is little agreement about how to measure social responsibility and ( 2 ) many current measures toss together a heap of information that has no business being lumped together .
34,34 org


Social responsibility often includes everything from treatment of employees to type of product produced .
8,8 per


There is not really any reason to believe that selling guns or tobacco has anything to do with forcing employees to work unpaid overtime .
19,19 per|10,10 wea


Yet both get lumped together in the socially responsible investing discussion .



Once you start to break apart social responsibility into its various components , you start to see the valuable information .
1,1 per|13,13 per


Companies that have poor employee relations tend to underperform , as do companies that pollute at a higher rate than their industry peers .
22,22 org|4,4 per|13,13 org|12,12 org|20,20 org|0,0 org
4,4 per|0,0 org| org-aff

On the other hand , companies with numerous NLRB violations do n't do worse than their peers and companies that sell your typical " sin " products ( tobacco , firearms , gambling ) can be excellent investments .
18,18 org|19,19 org|37,37 org|15,15 org|5,5 org|8,8 org|16,16 org|21,21 per|30,30 wea
18,18 org|30,30 wea| art

Lump all these things together and of course you will get mixed results .
8,8 per


Taken separately , they provide valuable information about future firm performance .
9,9 org


I guess it is time to get beyond the image of the greedy capitalist vs. hippie tree hugger in this discussion .
13,13 per|17,17 per|15,15 per|0,0 per


Though that would make a great Celebrity Death Match episode .



Here are abstracts from 16 significant studies about socially responsible investing and an interesting essay on the subject .



CNN_ENG_20030408_200618 .14

20030502



Report : Accident on Chinese submarine kills all 70 aboard



BEIJING ( AP )
0,0 gpe|2,2 org


An accident on a diesel-powered Chinese submarine has killed all 70 officers and sailors aboard , the official Xinhua News Agency reported Friday .
6,6 veh|5,5 gpe|18,20 org|11,11 per|13,13 per
11,11 per|6,6 veh| art|13,13 per|6,6 veh| art|5,5 gpe|6,6 veh| art

The accident occurred `` recently '' in Chinese waters east of the Neichangshan islands , the brief Chinese-language report said .
7,7 gpe|8,8 loc|12,13 loc
8,8 loc|7,7 gpe| part-whole|8,8 loc|12,13 loc| phys

The islands are in the Yellow Sea , between the northeastern province of Liaoning and North Korea .
1,1 loc|5,6 loc|13,13 gpe|11,11 gpe|15,16 gpe
1,1 loc|5,6 loc| part-whole|5,6 loc|11,11 gpe| phys|5,6 loc|15,16 gpe| phys

The submarine was on an exercise when the accident occurred , and `` because of a mechanical malfunction , the 70 crew members on board died , '' the Xinhua report said .
1,1 veh|29,29 org|21,21 per|22,22 per
22,22 per|1,1 veh| art

It did not give further details or say how the crew died .
10,10 per


The vessel already has been towed back to an unidentified port , Xinhua said .
10,10 gpe|1,1 veh|12,12 org


It said the hull number was 361 , which military analysts said appeared to make it a Ming - class submarine , a vessel used for patrols and coastal defense .
20,20 veh|15,15 veh|23,23 veh|10,10 per|17,17 veh|0,0 org


The announcement was unusual for a communist government that rarely acknowledges military accidents .
7,7 gpe|8,8 gpe


It was the first time China has announced a fatal submarine mishap , said Bernard Cole , a professor at the U.N . National War College in Washington and a specialist on the Chinese navy .
30,30 per|14,15 per|18,18 per|10,10 veh|23,25 org|27,27 gpe|34,34 org|5,5 gpe|33,33 gpe|21,21 gpe
23,25 org|21,21 gpe| gen-aff|18,18 per|23,25 org| org-aff|23,25 org|27,27 gpe| gen-aff|34,34 org|33,33 gpe| part-whole

`` There have been rumors going around about the loss of submarines , but this is the first fatal accident that I know of , '' said Cole .
21,21 per|27,27 per|11,11 veh


China 's military , which has a tradition of secrecy , did not comment about the accident Friday night .
0,0 gpe|2,2 org|4,4 org
2,2 org|0,0 gpe| part-whole

Foreign military analysts said it would be highly unusual for an accident to kill a whole submarine crew while still allowing the vessel to be recovered .
16,16 veh|22,22 veh|2,2 per|17,17 per
17,17 per|16,16 veh| art

They suggested possible causes ranging from a sinking in shallow water to a disaster that flooded the vessel with toxic chemical fumes .
17,17 veh|0,0 per


Michael McGinty , an expert on the Chinese navy from the Royal United Services Institute for Defense Studies in London , said that the mishap likely happened while the submarine was on the surface .
29,29 veh|8,8 org|7,7 gpe|0,1 per|4,4 per|11,17 org|19,19 gpe
8,8 org|7,7 gpe| part-whole|4,4 per|11,17 org| org-aff|11,17 org|19,19 gpe| gen-aff

If the accident happened when the vessel was underwater , it was less likely that China could have recovered it , said McGinty , a former British submariner .
6,6 veh|19,19 veh|15,15 gpe|22,22 per|27,27 per|26,26 gpe
27,27 per|26,26 gpe| org-aff

`` For an accident to have been so catastrophic when the submarine was on the surface , I find it a very mysterious thing , '' he said .
11,11 veh|17,17 per|26,26 per


McGinty said that the submarine 's batteries might have leaked acid that mixed with seawater , creating toxic chlorine gas that killed the crew .
4,4 veh|0,0 per|23,23 per


The torpedoes might have leaked propellant that poisoned the crew , he said .
11,11 per|1,1 wea|9,9 per


The accident could have occurred as long ago as March , said Cole , a former U.S . Navy antisubmarine warfare officer .
12,12 per|21,21 per|18,18 org|16,16 gpe
18,18 org|16,16 gpe| part-whole|21,21 per|18,18 org| org-aff

`` There have been exercises going on in the Yellow Sea over the past two months , '' he said .
18,18 per|9,10 loc


`` This boat could have been involved in those exercises and gone down over a month ago . ''
2,2 veh


Cole said the loss of all hands suggested the vessel was flooded or sank because of a collision or engineering problem .

MARKETVIEW_20041212 .1447



WEB TEXT



2004-12-12T14 :47:00



WalMart : Conglomerating ?



Byrne
0,0 per


2004-12-12T14 :47:00



Conglomerates are a fascinating species : The standard definition is ' a company involved in multiple unrelated businesses ' but the more accurate definition would be ' a company that relies on financial pyrotechnics , balance sheet juggling , and adroit accounting to create the illusion of growth ' .
0,0 org|12,12 org|28,28 org|29,29 org|4,4 org


I love to write about them , but I 'd hate to own one , since most of their market value comes from the market 's assumption that the company 's leaders will somehow find a way to retroactively justify their overvaluation .
5,5 org|18,18 org|29,29 org|13,13 org|31,31 per|40,40 per|8,8 per|0,0 per
31,31 per|29,29 org| org-aff|8,8 per|13,13 org| org-aff

Usually , it does n't work , but when it does the results can be spectacularly entertaining .



For a while ( see Ling-Temco-Vought or Tyco for details ) .
5,5 org|7,7 org


The recent rumors about WalMart 's plans to buy out a shipping company have given rise to the fear that the company may go the conglomerate route .
4,4 org|21,21 org|25,25 org|12,12 org
12,12 org|4,4 org| part-whole

They have many of the symptoms of a late-stage conglomerate : A gigantic main business with slowing growth , fear that competition will substantially reduce the profitability of their main business , a shareholder base that includes many people who own only WalMart stock ( thus providing another incentive for intracompany diversification ) , and enough resources to pull it off on a grand scale .
9,9 org|38,38 per|39,39 per|0,0 org|28,28 org|42,42 org|33,33 per|34,34 per|35,35 per
39,39 per|42,42 org| org-aff

I can understand the concerns , but I do n't see the motivation .
0,0 per|7,7 per


As a retailer of just about everything , WalMart can expand into some pretty broadly-defined areas without going beyond either their core competencies or some arenas where they can cut costs .
2,2 org|8,8 org|20,20 org|27,27 org


After all , adding some international shipping assets to their holdings would be a natural extension of their enormously successful practice of buying the distribution network for their products .
9,9 org|17,17 org|27,27 org


They 're coming close to Smithfield Food 's very successful ' squeal to meal ' policy ; if these rumors are true , the result for shareholders will be a pretty positive one .
0,0 org|5,6 org|26,26 per
26,26 per|0,0 org| org-aff

29,29 org|25,25 gpe| gen-aff|16,16 per|21,22 org| org-aff

The shorter Chinese route , a 2,400-kilometre project , would cost around half the Japanese pipeline , at 2.5 billion dollars ( 2.15 billion euros ) , and would need to transport just 20 million tonnes a year to be economic .
2,2 gpe|14,14 gpe|15,15 fac


China , whose booming economy has turned the country into an increasingly valuable economic partner for Russia , especially in its backward far eastern regions , is also a major purchaser of Russian weapons . "

0,0 gpe|5,5 gpe|10,10 gpe|9,9 loc

1,1 gpe|2,2 per

2,2 per


Just imagine how Nortel feels .
3,3 org


Early on Tuesday Nortel will be filing its 2003 financial statements .
7,7 org|3,3 org


It also expects to restate 2001 and 2002 earnings .
0,0 org


None of this is really new information .



So the worst is behind them right ?
5,5 org


Maybe .



Late filing of audited financial statements and earning restatements both factor into my External Reporting organizational indicator .
12,12 per


As a rule , I am wary of companies that do either of these things until I am confident that they have changed their standard business practices .
4,4 per|16,16 per|9,9 org|20,20 org|23,23 org|8,8 org


It may take a couple years , and several more financial filings ( on time of course ) , before I am persuaded to take a second look at the company .
30,30 org|20,20 per


The bottom line is that I rely on SEC filings to assess companies and I do n't want to have any doubt about the veracity of the information contained in these documents .
5,5 per|14,14 per|12,12 org|8,8 org


In Nortel 's defense , they have just gone through the perfect storm in the telecommunications equipment sector .
17,17 org|1,1 org|5,5 org


The whole industry overbuilt and got blindsided by the tech downturn .
2,2 org


This could be described as a growth industry that went on a bender and is now trying to recover from the hangover .
7,7 org


I 've always felt that you learn a lot about someone when you see how they try to recover from a hangover ( pause for brief college flashback ) .
10,10 per|15,15 per|26,26 org|5,5 per|12,12 per|0,0 per


This is a great time to assess organizational effectiveness in the telecommunications equipment industry .
13,13 org

I 'm not drunk ! )
0,0 per


and hope for an uptick in demand before they would have to come clean .

Scott
0,0 per

Here 's an incredible story about an unsung hero until now .
8,8 per


From BBC News : A retired Italian doctor has revealed for the first time how he invented a fictitious disease which fooled the Nazis during World War II .
6,6 gpe|15,15 per|7,7 per|1,2 org|23,23 per
7,7 per|6,6 gpe| gen-aff

The trick of prescribing Jews with a mysterious illness terrified the Nazis and saved 45 Roman Jews .
11,11 per|16,16 per|4,4 per|15,15 gpe
16,16 per|15,15 gpe| gen-aff

Dr Vittorio Sacerdoti has told his remarkable tale on the 60th anniversary of liberation of Rome .
5,5 per|1,2 per|15,15 gpe


Just 28 years old at the time , he used courage and ingenuity to save 45 people from certain death .
8,8 per|16,16 per


As other Jews were being rounded up , Dr Sacerdoti admitted anyone who could reach the hospital as patients - and diagnosed them with a dangerous disease . "
12,12 per|22,22 per|18,18 per|11,11 per|16,16 fac|9,9 per|2,2 per


We would write on their medical forms that the patient was suffering from K Syndrome , " he said . "
4,4 per|0,0 per|17,17 per|9,9 per


We called it K after the German commander Kesserling - the Nazis thought it was cancer or tuberculosis , and they fled like rabbits . "
0,0 per|6,6 gpe|8,8 per|7,7 per|11,11 per|20,20 per
7,7 per|6,6 gpe| org-aff

K Syndrome saved his cousin , Luciana Sacerdoti , who was just 10 years old . "
6,7 per|9,9 per|4,4 per|3,3 per
3,3 per|4,4 per| per-soc

The day the Nazis came to the hospital , someone came to our room and said : ' You have to cough , you have to cough a lot because they are afraid of the coughing , they do n't want to catch an awful disease and they wo n't enter ' . "

LONDON , May 8 ( AFP )
0,0 gpe|5,5 org


British bank Barclays announced on Thursday it had agreed to buy Spanish rival Banco Zaragozano for 1.14 billion euros ( 1.29 billion dollars ) in cash . "
1,1 org|2,2 org|6,6 org|11,11 gpe|12,12 org|13,14 org|0,0 gpe

The combination of the banking operations of Barclays Spain and Zaragozano will bring together two complementary businesses , creating a nationwide distribution platform , trebling the existing Barclays branch network and trebling its existing customer base , " Barclays said in a statement . "
38,38 org|7,8 org|27,27 org|32,32 org|10,10 org|16,16 org|35,35 per|34,34 per

GAZA CITY , June 30 ( AFP )

Palestinian security forces returned Monday to the positions they held in the Gaza Strip before the outbreak of the 33-month Palestinian uprising as Israel removed all major checkpoints in the coastal territory , a Palestinian security source said .

3,4 per|1,2 per|6,6 per|20,20 per|26,26 per|14,14 per|15,16 per|18,18 per|0,0 gpe
1,2 per|0,0 gpe| org-aff

Hariri submitted his resignation during a 10-minute meeting with the head of state at the Baabda presidential palace , outside the capital .
0,0 per|2,2 per|17,17 fac|15,15 gpe|10,10 per|21,21 gpe|12,12 gpe
17,17 fac|21,21 gpe| phys|0,0 per|17,17 fac| phys|10,10 per|17,17 fac| phys

The statement did not give any reason for the move , but said Lahoud would begin consultations Wednesday aimed at the formation of a new government .
25,25 org|13,13 per


Hariri has headed the country 's government for nine of the past 11 years , and highly placed governmental sources said he would probably stay on in the job .
19,19 per|0,0 per|21,21 per|4,4 gpe|6,6 gpe


The current government was formed in October 2000 .
2,2 org


Under the power-sharing arrangement reached following the end of Lebanon 's 15-year civil war in 1990 , the prime ministerial post is always held by a Sunni Muslim and the presidency by a Maronite Christian .
